short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add beautiful gradients backgrounds to images directly in X/Twitter posts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a tool for X/Twitter. You can add a nice gradient background to your images directly from the post.

Just click the new image icon, load the image, and make your images more cachy with a gradient background without leaving X.

Yo can use the BlueSky version here:
https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/bluesky-image-bg-framer/ebadbopjnnllkplbkebpndhenfaefodg
